episodes.title: Samuel Jackson Beer & Racial Draft
episodes.plot: Dave debuts Samuel Jackson beer, shows us how much cooler life would be if everything were in slow motion and reveals the latest picks in "The Racial Draft".

episodes.title: Negrodamus & The Niggar Family
episodes.plot: Dave plays the watermelon-shooting Black Gallagher and introduces the Niggar Family; Paul Mooney guest stars as "Negrodamus." Musical guest DMX.

episodes.title: White People Can't Dance & The Three Daves
episodes.plot: Dave explores the myth that white people can't dance and charts his own emotional growth at ages 18, 24, and 30; musical performance by John Mayer & Ahmir "Questlove" Thompson.

episodes.title: The Love Contract & True Hollywood Stories: Rick James
episodes.plot: Dave introduces The Love Contract and the first of Charlie Murphy's True Hollywood Stories featuring Rick James. Musical guest Ludacris.

episodes.title: True Hollywood Stories: Prince & Red Balls Energy Drink
episodes.plot: Charlie Murphy reveals another True Hollywood Story featuring Prince, and Paul Mooney answers life's biggest questions as "Negrodamus." Cee-Lo performs "Call Me".

episodes.title: The Internet & Moment In The Life Of Lil Jon
episodes.plot: Dave considers what life is like for rap sensation Lil' Jon and imagines how sleazy the Internet would look if it were a place. Anthony Hamilton performs "Comin' From Where I'm From".

episodes.title: World Series Of Dice & Mooney On Movies
episodes.plot: Dave broadcasts the World Series of Dice and spends another moment in the life of Lil' John; musical performance by Common & Kanye West.

episodes.title: I Know Black People & Keeping It Real Goes Wrong
episodes.plot: Dave hosts his new game show "I Know Black People," with another installment of "When Keeping it Real Goes Wrong"; musical performance by Erykah Badu.

episodes.title: Oprah's Baby Daddy & Jury Duty
episodes.plot: Dave imagines life as Oprah's baby's daddy and shares his experience as a jury member on the OJ Simpson trial; musical performance by Wyclef Jean.

episodes.title: Kneehigh Park & Making Da Band
episodes.plot: Dave takes a closer look at the Diddy-driven show "Making da Band" and premieres his new puppet show Kneehigh Park; musical performance by Snoop Dogg.

episodes.title: Mandela Boot Camp & The Time Haters
episodes.plot: Dave reveals his greatest misses. Previously unaired sketches that did not work.

episodes.title: Wayne Brady & Tyrone Biggums's Fear Factor
episodes.plot: Wayne Brady replaces Dave on his own show and takes him for a menacing ride. Tyrone Biggums returns as a guest on Fear Factor.

episodes.title: Lil Jon On Lil Jon & Black Bush
episodes.plot: Dave considers how recent events would have played out if President Bush were black and spends another moment in the life of Lil' John.

episodes.title: The Best of Chappelle's Show: Season 2, Volume 1
episodes.plot: The best sketches from season 2 of the Comedy Central hit series "Chappelle's Show."

episodes.title: Music Jump-Off
episodes.plot: A collection of musical acts from past episodes.

episodes.title: The Best of Chappelle's Show: Season 2, Volume 2 (except Rick James)
episodes.plot: Know what this is about? Be the first one to add a plot.
